page.title: 11CORONATION PARK
page.content: {Coronation Park,}named in honour of{ {Queen Victoria's Coronation}originally belonged to {Jesse Boot,}founder of Boot's Chemists. The park has been designed with the {handicapped}in mind,and there are many ramps to make it easy for people in wheelchairs to visit. Inside, apart from lawns and flower beds, there is a large children's playground,paddling pool and a pond for model boats. The park receives its water from an underground stream running from St. Lawrence to the beach. Where the park is now once was only sand dunes, and if you dig down you very soon come to pure sand. Next to the park are the{Recreation {Grounds }where you can play football, hockey, cricket and tennis.
